2095230.name: Limousine Parking Simulator
2095230.description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to park a limousine? Here is about skills and attention.

As a personal driver, you will encounter all kinds of obstacles in front of you, which must be avoided nicely and accurately. Your mission as a limousine driver is to learn how to drive almost perfect a limousine. So, be very careful while driving, because you are not driving the cheapest car... You don't have to upset your boss about scratching your car. Good Luck!

Game Features :
- 3 expensive limousine cars
- 10 levels
- Daily Spin
- Limited time for each level
2095230.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 简体中文
